I also get this exception if I remove a basic mapping from the xml through the source editor:

<attributes>
	<basic name="name">
		<column name="f"/>
	</basic>
</attributes>

Remove the basic element and get this NPE
I am no longer able to reproduce this, appears it was fixed as a result of other bug fixes.  Reopen if you find a way to reproduce

I was able to reproduce this by code completing the basic tag, creating this:

<basic name=""></basic>

and then backspacing over the closing tag.

Exception happened (for me) at:

<basic name=""></b



This is reproducible (for me) by doing this first thing on starting up.
After some testing, doesn't appear to be a must fix for 1.0, un-targeting for now.
